projects.title: Far-Sighted BiSeNet V2 for Real-time Semantic Segmentation
projects.description: Accepted by the 17th IEEE International Conference AVSS as the first author. Proposed an object-integrity aware model maintaining high accuracy with FPS 96 on 1024x 2048 image with 3% (mIoU) enhancement to the base model. Please visit the link below for the publication.

projects.title: Generative AI Learning Platform
projects.description: Developed e-learning platform with Next.js, optimized server operations, integrated RESTful APIs, and enhanced MySQL communication with OpenAI integration. Click the icon below or image to visit the website.

projects.title: Itinerary Recommendation Social Media
projects.description: Developed dynamic backend for user content and social interactions, added interactive features (post liking/ voting/ leaderboard), integrated RESTful APIs, and managed MySQL CRUD operations.

projects.title: Autonomous Vehicle Routes Optimization
projects.description: Developed dynamic backend for user content and social interactions, added interactive features (post liking/ voting/ leaderboard), integrated RESTful APIs, and managed MySQL CRUD operations.

projects.title: RGB-Thermal Fusion Semantic Segmentation
projects.description: Proposed robust attention fusion modules, enhanced model by 6.4% mIoU, overcame lighting challenges, outperformed multiple ground truths, and achieved 58.3% mIoU over SOTA.
